thread.title: Peta Muragtroyd shows off her post-baby body as she heads back to the gym for the first time since giving birth
thread.title_full: Peta Muragtroyd shows off her post-baby body as she heads back to the gym for the first time since giving birth

author: nicolemoschella
title: Peta Muragtroyd shows off her post-baby body as she heads back to the gym for the first time since giving birth
text:
Rare People January 22, 2017 12:34 pm Peta Muragtroyd shows off her post-baby body as she heads back to the gym for the first time since giving birth   
Peta Muragtroyd is getting back into her old routine. 
The new mom to son Shai Alexsander took to Instagram on Saturday night to share a photo of her post-baby body, just 17 days after giving birth. 
In a lengthy post on Instagram, she shared her struggle in the journey to get her body back after having a child. A photo posted by Peta Murgatroyd (@petamurgatroyd) on Jan 21, 2017 at 1:44pm PST 
‚Äú I think I‚Äôm doing ok‚Ä¶.and I‚Äôm actually fine with the rate at which my body is shrinking back. After 2 days back at the gym I‚Äôm feeling like the old Peta again. I definitely don‚Äôt have my 6 pack, and I still have excess skin and rolls on my belly, however I feel good,‚Äù she wrote. 
‚Äú I needed to get back into the gym for my own sanity, but I also remind myself (as does Maks üòâ) that I still need to take it easy. I cannot jump yet and still can‚Äôt run a mile, but the exercises I‚Äôve planned out are a good start. Honestly, the hardest part for me is getting my core strength back,‚Äù she continued. 
RELATED: ‚ÄúModern Family‚Äù star Julie Bowen faced serious backlash for a joke she made about Barron Trump 
She wrapped the post up with a message to other moms who are trying to get back in shape. 
‚Äú Ladies, we all have to start somewhere‚Ä¶being an athlete I pride myself on having a lean, strong physique, so believe me this has been a challenge to work through, but as long as you have a loving support network around you, you will be fine,‚Äù she wrote. 
By the looks of it, she will be back in shape in no time!
